entry.title: This Trump voter is sure he will win. Here's why

media:group.media:title: This Trump voter is sure he will win. Here's why
media:group.media:description: CNN's Alisyn Camerota brings together six people who voted for President Trump in 2016. They discuss his leadership, racial unrest, and if he will leave office. #CNN #News

entry.title: Germany seeing potential second wave of coronavirus

media:group.media:title: Germany seeing potential second wave of coronavirus
media:group.media:description: Germany is seeing a spike in Covid-19 cases that officials are calling 'disturbing'. CNN's Frederik Pleitgen is in Berlin with the lastest update. #CNNI #News

entry.title: Campaign co-chair reacts to Joe Biden's handwritten note

media:group.media:title: Campaign co-chair reacts to Joe Biden's handwritten note
media:group.media:description: Presumptive Democratic nominee Joe Biden was photographed holding handwritten notes with Sen. Kamala Harris' name at the top along with a set of talking points about her, fueling fresh speculation about the California Democrat's standing as a vice presidential running mate. Biden campaign co-chair Cedric Richmond reacts to the buzz. #CNN #News

entry.title: Top economist Paul Krugman thinks economy is going to lockdown again

media:group.media:title: Top economist Paul Krugman thinks economy is going to lockdown again
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Don Lemon talks to American economist and author Paul Krugman about President Trump's remarks on the economy and the GOP's stimulus plan.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Chris Cuomo reacts to Trump comment 'nobody likes me'

media:group.media:title: Chris Cuomo reacts to Trump comment 'nobody likes me'
media:group.media:description:
President Trump wondered during a coronavirus press briefing why Dr. Anthony Fauci's approval rating was so high and his was so low. CNN's Chris Cuomo gives his take.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump promoted a doctor. Watch what she said about demons

media:group.media:title: Trump promoted a doctor. Watch what she said about demons
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Anderson Cooper discusses President Donald Trump's response to the coronavirus and a video he retweeted featuring a group of doctors making false claims about the coronavirus.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Russia intends to be first in the world to approve coronavirus vaccine

media:group.media:title: Russia intends to be first in the world to approve coronavirus vaccine
media:group.media:description:
Russia intends to be the first in the world to approve a coronavirus vaccine, despite concerns about its safety, effectiveness and whether the country has cut essential corners in development. CNN's Matthew Chance reports.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Tapper rebukes Jim Jordan: You owe CNN reporters an apology

media:group.media:title: Tapper rebukes Jim Jordan: You owe CNN reporters an apology
media:group.media:description:
Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) played a montage of violence at protests around the country and removed crucial context from what CNN reporters said about it. CNN's Jake Tapper says Jordan owes these reporters an apology.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump walks out of briefing after CNN question

media:group.media:title: Trump walks out of briefing after CNN question
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump abruptly ended his coronavirus briefing at the White House following a question about his tweets by CNN's Kaitlin Collins. Trump defended the tweets in support of hydroxychloroquine saying that the drug is still "very positive" and called a doctor who was spreading conspiracy theories on Covid-19 in a now deleted video "very impressive." #CNN #News

entry.title: Lawmaker to Barr: I'm starting to lose my temper

media:group.media:title: Lawmaker to Barr: I'm starting to lose my temper
media:group.media:description: Rep. Pramila Jayapal (D-WA) asks Attorney General Bill Barr about federal officers descending on protesters near the White House ahead of a photo-op for President Donald Trump. #CNN #News

entry.title: Attorney General Bill Barr: The President has told me to exercise my independent judgement

media:group.media:title: Attorney General Bill Barr: The President has told me to exercise my independent judgement
media:group.media:description: Watch Attorney General Bill Barr's complete opening statements before the House Judiciary Committee. #CNN #News

entry.title: 10 wildest lines from Trump’s Fox News interview

media:group.media:title: 10 wildest lines from Trump’s Fox News interview
media:group.media:description:
President Trump sat down with Fox News’ Chris Wallace in July for a conversation on the coronavirus crisis — among other things. Chris Cillizza breaks down the 10 wildest lines from the President from that interview.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: The 55 most shocking lines from Chris Wallace's interview with Donald Trump https://www.cnn.com/2020/07/20/politics/donald-trump-chris-wallace-coronavirus/index.html
Florida has more Covid-19 than most countries in the world. These stats show how serious the problem is https://www.cnn.com/2020/07/13/health/florida-coronavirus-cases-comparisons/index.html
What Americans Need to Know About Europe’s Travel Ban https://www.nytimes.com/article/eu-travel-ban-explained-usa.html
Trump believes coronavirus will vanish with April temps — experts are skeptical warm weather alone is enough https://www.marketwatch.com/story/trump-believes-coronavirus-will-vanish-with-april-temps-experts-are-skeptical-warm-weather-alone-is-enough-2020-03-12
Biden says he doesn’t support defunding the police https://www.cnn.com/2020/06/08/politics/joe-biden-defund-the-police/index.html
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Steven Sevilla Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://www.cnn.com/specials/politics/the-point-with-chris-cillizza?source=Point_Youtube.
#CNN #Cillizza #ChrisWallace

entry.title: Twitter restricts Donald Trump Jr. for sharing coronavirus misinformation video

media:group.media:title: Twitter restricts Donald Trump Jr. for sharing coronavirus misinformation video
media:group.media:description: Donald Trump Jr had his Twitter account restricted after he shared a video that spread misinformation on the coronavirus. CNN's Poppy Harlow and Jim Sciutto discuss with CNN Chief Political Correspondent, Dana Bash and infectious disease specialist Dr. Carlos del Rio. #CNN #News

entry.title: Voter gets heated defending Trump response to Covid-19 pandemic

media:group.media:title: Voter gets heated defending Trump response to Covid-19 pandemic
media:group.media:description: CNN's Alisyn Camerota brings together six people who voted for President Trump in 2016. They discuss his handling of the coronavirus pandemic, wearing masks, and if they will vote for him again in 2020. #CNN #News

entry.title: Anderson Cooper calls out Trump for golfing while virus surges

media:group.media:title: Anderson Cooper calls out Trump for golfing while virus surges
media:group.media:description: CNN's Anderson Cooper calls out President Trump for failing to lead on the coronavirus pandemic. #CNN #News
